Lauderhill.Westfield Broward: Westfield Broward (previously known as the Broward Mall) is a one-level 1,000,000-square-foot (93,000 m2) shopping mall in Plantation, Florida, a suburb of Fort Lauderdale. It is managed and co-owned by the Westfield Group. The center features 125 retail and service shops, four department stores, and a variety of casual dining venues.
